text: École spéciale de mécanique et électricité, commonly named ESME-Sudria, is a French private high school establishment located in Paris, Ivry-sur-Seine, Bordeaux, Lille and Lyon,ESME Sudria : implantation à Lille et Lyon, nouveau campus à Paris, nouveau concours Advance et intégration dans APB France.ESME Sudria ESME-Sudria is specialized in the fields of electrical engineering, electronics, mechanics, telecommunications, and computer engineering. The school is part of IONIS Education Group. ==List of ESME Sudria heads== * Joachim Sudria : 1905 - 1950 * Pierre Doceul : 1950 - 1980 * Jean Doceul : 1980 - 2003 * Hervé Laborne : 2003 - 2011 * Roger Ceschi : 2011 - 2014 * Eric Simon : 2014 - 2015 * Véronique Bonnet : Since 2015 ==Notable Alumni== * Marc Sellam (1974), founder and current President of IONIS Education Group.Interview de Marc SELLAM, Président et Fondateur du Groupe IONIS ==References== Category:Schools in France Category:1905 establishments in France
title: ESME-Sudria
